function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in public transportation and construction sites during natural disasters.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission and infection among workers and the public.","Mitigation":"Implement stricter social distancing measures and restructuring of public transportation and construction site operations.","Technologies":"Technological solutions for contactless entry, occupancy monitoring, and air quality control in transportation and construction settings.","People":"Workers, public transportation operators, and the general public in affected areas.","Owner":"Construction site managers, transportation operators, and relevant authorities."},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on environmental waste and greenhouse gas emissions.","Impact":"Increased environmental waste from medical supplies and decreased household waste. Decline in greenhouse gas emissions due to reduced road travel, industrial, and educational activities.","Mitigation":"Development of sustainable waste management policies and renewable energy strategies. Promotion of remote work and virtual communication to reduce environmental impact.","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, waste management technologies, and virtual communication platforms.","People":"Environmental authorities, public health officials, and workers in the renewable energy and waste management sectors.","Owner":"Environmental policymakers, renewable energy companies, and organizations promoting sustainable practices."},{"Description":"Lack of quantitative data on COVID-19 impact in the construction industry.","Impact":"Limited understanding of the extent of COVID-19 transmission and infection risk among construction workers.","Mitigation":"Conducting quantitative analysis and research on COVID-19 impact in the construction industry. Improving data collection and reporting from construction sites.","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, data analysis tools, and digital reporting systems.","People":"Construction workers, construction site managers, and public health researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, construction industry stakeholders, and health authorities."}]}
